Naruto enters his [[Nine-Tails Chakra Mode]]'s [[Tailed Beast]] form, then proceeds to create nine separate [[Tailed Beast Ball Rasenshuriken]] within each of his tails, using the elemental properties of [[Magnet Release|Magnet]], [[Fire Release|Fire]], [[Water Release|Water]], [[Lava Release|Lava]], [[Boil Release|Boil]] and [[Wind Release]], as well as Tailed Beast [[chakra]]. He then throws each Rasenshuriken towards his opponent, culminating in a multitude of explosions.

[[pl:Chō Bijū Ōdama Rasenshuriken]]
